attributes.action: prevent Donald Trump, through new UK-wide legislation, from destroying the Scottish (or any other British) countryside for profit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has more than enough golf courses; it does not need another one, even a luxury one, no matter how cool some yank thinks it would be. We realise he's not used to being told no and we pity his sheltered life, but he should not be permitted to destroy a rather beautiful area of special scientific interest, home to several endangered species, just because he thinks it's a great idea. If Alex will not step in and say no, we all must.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
